channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Exclusive: Pluralis raises $7.6 million from prominent investors to take on OpenAI with big decentralized models
item.description: Alexander Long has assembled a team of PhDs and postdocs to see if it’s possible to build decentralized models that compete with the tech titans.

item.title: Millennials choosing to be DINKs could push GDP down by as much as 4%
item.description: "By the time you get to 2030, you're talking about a birth rate that is wildly different to what was in the assumptions made at the beginning of the d...

item.title: XRP soars 10% after Ripple CEO says SEC will drop appeal
item.description: The lawsuit was one of the agency’s longest-running cases against a crypto company.

item.title: Exclusive: Crypto wallet infrastructure company Privy raises $15 million in round led by Ribbit Capital
item.description: The company will use the money to double the size of its team in the next 18 months.

item.title: Unilever hit ‘new levels of oppressiveness,’ Ben & Jerry’s claims as its CEO was sacked over his refusal to ‘silence the social mission’
item.description: David Stever had been with Ben & Jerry’s for 34 years in total. Ben & Jerry's claims Unilever didn't oust him for performance reasons.

item.title: Boeing — trailed distantly by Apple and Nvidia — paces blue-chip advance at open
